title: parvata rAjakumAri
sahitya:
parvata rAjakumAri shrI pArvati pAhimAm paramEshvari


anupallavi

 sarvAnandamaya cakra vAsini sad guruguha janani shrIranjani 
sharvANi shambhumOhini sharashcandrikA dhavaLa prakAshini


caraNam   kailAsapura vilasita prasiddha kAmEshvari kanjalOcani 
kavi hrdayAvEshini pAsha mOcani pAkashAsanAdi dEva pAlini 
kaulini tripurAdi mardini kandarpa janakApAnga vIkSaNi 
kaivalya pradAyini kAvyAlApa vinOdini mandahAsini
